text: 2001 is the second studio album by American rapper Dr. Dre. It was released on November 16, 1999 by Interscope Records. 2001 is the follow-up to Dr. Dre's first album The Chronic (1991). The album features several guest rappers such as Hittman, Snoop Dogg, Kurupt, Xzibit, Nate Dogg, and Eminem. 2001 has been certified sextuple platinum in sales by the RIAA after sales of six million copies in the United States. == Songs == ==References== Category:1999 albums Category:Rap music
title: 2001 (Dr. Dre album)
